Text saved: An asteroid is a big rock in space.

There is another idea to protect Earth. An asteroid could hit our planet. The idea is to destroy it with a nuclear bomb. This sounds like an idea from a movie. The movie Armageddon was about this.

But it is a real idea from NASA. The idea's name is HAMMER. They would send big rockets to the asteroid. They hope the rockets will push it. This will change its direction.

But sometimes the asteroid is very near Earth. Then this plan will not work. So the rockets will carry nuclear bombs. They will use the bombs to destroy the asteroid.
